snippet: A dispute between Time Warner Cable and MSG has meant that a number of viewers can’t watch the Knicks, Rangers and Sabres. A resolution does not appear imminent.
abstract: Blackout continues for New York sports fans as dispute between Time Warner Cable and MSG remains unresolved.
lead_paragraph: A dispute between Time Warner Cable and MSG has meant that a number of viewers can’t watch the Knicks, Rangers and Sabres. A resolution does not appear imminent.

headline.seo: For Time Warner Cable and MSG, a Stand-Off With No End in Sight
headline.main: MSG and Time Warner Continue to Face Off
headline.print_headline: MSG and Time Warner Continue to Face Off
